short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces specified URLs with others upon pasting text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL Replacer is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow by automatically replacing specified URLs when you paste text into input fields and contentEditable elements. Whether you're working with multiple lines or single entries, URL Replacer ensures your links are always up-to-date and consistent across various platforms.
